errors.error_description: Used deprecated --install-option flag in pip command which is no longer supported in modern pip versions
correction_candidates: Use `pip install django-mysql` without any install options
Use `python -m pip install django-mysql` for better compatibility
Install using `pip install --user django-mysql` for user-specific installation
Use `pip install django-mysql --upgrade` to ensure latest version
errors.golden_answer: Use `pip install django-mysql` without any install options
